definition: confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out

sentences.english: The physician made a prescription against seasickness for him.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他开了个治晕船的药方。

sentences.english: During the voyage, he was terribly seasick and deported back to his home ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 因航行途中晕船厉害，被提前遣送回乡。

sentences.english: The passengers turned quite green with sea- sickness .
sentences.chinese: 旅客们由于晕船而脸色发青。

sentences.english: The cross was very calm. So no one was seasick .
sentences.chinese: 渡海时很平静，因此没人晕船。

sentences.english: I get sea-sick sometimes when the sea is rough.
sentences.chinese: 海浪大时我有时会晕船。

sentences.english: Grant, the captain, has been with the company for 13 years. He still gets seasick.
sentences.chinese: 船长格兰特在这家公司已经13年了，还是有点晕船。

sentences.english: Objective To conduct safety evaluation of serial anti- seasickness oral solutions for animal toxicology.
sentences.chinese: 目的对系列抗晕船口服液进行安全性评价。

sentences.english: Objective To survey and analyze the relative factors influencing the habituation and off-habituation of the seasickness .
sentences.chinese: 目的调查相关因素对晕船适应及脱适应过程的影响。

sentences.english: For ocean views without the motion sickness, set up shop on a remote island.
sentences.chinese: 想要看海又不想晕船，就找个偏远的海岛开家小店吧。

sentences.english: Medically speaking seasickness is a variation of motion sickness or kinetosis.
sentences.chinese: 从医学角度讲，晕船是一种运动病。

sentences.english: Dry ginger root powder has marked anti-sea-sickness effect which is stronger than dimenhydrinate .
sentences.chinese: 干姜粉具有明显的抗晕船作用，其效果强于晕海宁。

sentences.english: Those motion-sickness patches can really help calm a churning stomach on a boat.
sentences.chinese: 那些晕船类的贴片真的能帮助你在船上不反胃恶心。

sentences.english: She's seasick?I'd sooner teach a fish how to swim.
sentences.chinese: 她会晕船？那鱼也得学游泳了。

sentences.english: I have been recommended to try these pills for sea-sickness.
sentences.chinese: 有人建议我用这些药丸来治晕船。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the sea sickness preventing effect of orally taken dry ginger root powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证服用干姜粉预防晕船的效果。

definition: altitude sickness/acute mountain sickness/abbr. to 高反[gao1 fan3]
to have morning sickness during pregnancy/to have a strong appetite for certain foods (during pregnancy)
(of a boat) to reach the shore/to pull toward shore/close to shore/landfall
altitude sickness/abbr. for 高原反應|高原反应[gao1 yuan2 fan3 ying4]
